dict.acceptation: 弧线，曲线；曲线状物；弯曲物；[棒]曲线板；
使弯曲；使成曲线；使成弧形；
弯曲；弯成曲线，弯成弧形；沿曲线行进；

sent.orig: Pump performance curves of the three main curve: Flow-lift curve, traffic-power curve, traffic-the efficiency curve.
sent.trans: 水泵性能曲线主要有三条曲线：流量—扬程曲线，流量—功率曲线，流量—效率曲线。

sent.orig: General-ly speaking, the curve can be divided as: hook, small curve and big curve.
sent.trans: 一般来说，曲球从球的运行路线上又可分为： 勾手、小曲球和大曲球。

sent.orig: Generally speaking, the curve can be divided hook, small curve and big curve.
sent.trans: 一般来说，曲线从球的运行路线上又可分为： 勾手、小曲球和大曲球。

sent.orig: The stress-strain curve, unload curve and secondary loading curve of honey-comb cardboard were gained and analysed.
sent.trans: 在试验的基础上，研究蜂窝纸板的力学性能，得到了蜂窝纸板的压缩曲线及卸载曲线、二次加载曲线。

sent.orig: Changes in their relationship with money that curve, this curve is called the pump performance curve.
sent.trans: 他们之间的量值变化关系用曲线来表示，这种曲线就称为水泵的性能曲线。
